entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -11.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
